alert.note: Alert for Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 4:24PM EDT until July 29 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SCHUYLKILL COUNTY... At 424 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pine Grove, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Schuylkill Haven, Pine Grove, Tremont, Friedensburg, Donaldson, Lake Wynonah, Cressona, Auburn, Deer Lake, Ravine, Port Clinton and Newtown. This includes Interstate 81 between mile markers 102 and 107, and from mile markers 110 to 111. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
